curriculumPageHints.hint:
The Learning Outcomes Tab
Clicking on this will take you to a page with learning outcomes of the selected program

The Criteria Tab
Clicking on this tab will take you to a page with details on the criteria on the selected program.

The Frameworks Tab
Clicking on this tab will take you to a page with details on the framework.

takeThisTourAgainHint.hint:
You can take the tour again by clicking on this icon
See you later!

learningOutcomesSteps.intro: This tab will help you navigate to a page with learning outcome details
You can use this to filter the learning outcomes by Program, Framework, and Criteria.

Clicking on this button will pop up a modal with which you can add learning outcomes.

Watch Demo
This table shows the details of the learning outcomes.

programDetailsSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Curriculum Page.

Here, you can view all the details of the selected program including the frameworks, their criteria, and their learning outcomes.
You can view the respective program phases details by clicking on any of the numbers.
This will show you the specific details of the program phase that has been selected based on Values Alignment, Output Quality and Feedback.

Look Out! This is a hint

Look out for them. Click on them to get more information about certain parts of the page

criteriaSteps.intro: This tab will help you navigate to a page with Criteria details
You can use this to filter the criteria for a given framework.
Clicking this will pop up a modal with which you can add a criterion.
Clicking on this will allow you to edit a criterion.
This will archive a criterion. Note that clicking on this will render the criterion inaccessible in areas previously used.
This is the criteria table. It displays a list Criterion

frameworkSteps.intro: This tab will help you navigate to a page that has framework details
This table shows the three frameworks captured on VOF, i.e. Values Alignment, Output Quality and Feedback and their description.
Clicking on this will pop up a modal with which you can edit the framework.
